name: jsts
description: A JavaScript library of spatial predicates and functions for processing geometry
author: Bj√∂rn Harrtell <bjorn@wololo.org>

scripts.build: npm run build-umd && npm run build-es6
scripts.build-umd: rollup -c rollup.config.js -o dist/jsts.js && terser dist/jsts.js --source-map content=dist/jsts.js.map,filename=dist/jsts.min.js.map,url=jsts.min.js.map --comments -c -m -o dist/jsts.min.js
scripts.build-es6: rollup -c rollup.config.es6.js -o dist/jsts.es6.js && terser dist/jsts.es6.js --module --source-map content=dist/jsts.es6.js.map,filename=dist/jsts.es6.min.js.map,url=jsts.es6.min.js.map --comments -c -m -o dist/jsts.es6.min.js
